x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
Many organizations run green initiatives such as energy conservation, waste reduction, or recycling programs. However, these efforts are often tracked informally through spreadsheets or emails, making it hard to:
-Assign clear responsibilities for each sustainability action -Monitor progress and deadlines in real time -Measure and report the actual environmental impact -Keep different departments engaged and accountable -Without a structured platform, sustainability goals can become vague, delayed, or forgotten.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Service Catalog: Create a catalog item to submit new sustainability tasks
  • Flow Designer: Automate task creation, assignments, and notifications
  • SLA Definitions: To track deadlines and ensure timely execution
  • Notifications: Send alerts, reminders, and celebration messages for completed actions
  • App Engine Studio: Create a custom Sustainability Action table to store and manage initiatives
  • Performance Analytics: Visualize key sustainability metrics such as completion rates and impact

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • SLA configuration for tracking timelines
  • Flow Designer setup for automation and escalations
  • Catalog item configuration with dynamic fields
  • Notifications and reporting setup
  • Optional future integrations with Environmental tracking tools

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Defining meaningful and measurable KPIs
  • Ensuring data quality and consistency
  • Driving user adoption and engagement
  • Establishing accountability and ownership
  • Setting up and maintaining Performance Analytics
  • Managing cultural change and resistance
